Description.Text:
Position The hotel is situated in the heart of Riccione city, about 100 m from the beach and a few steps from the famous shopping streets - Viale Dante & Viale Ceccarini.
Restaurant Air-conditioned restaurant.
More Informations Last partial refurbishment has took place in 2011.
Restaurant offers for lunch and dinner mixed buffet, fruit or dessert. Sweet and salty buffet breakfast.
Outdoor heated swimming pool open from 08/06-07/09/13 from 08:00 to 20:00.
Unguarded enclosed car parking at 150 mt from the hotel.
From 08/06/13 to 01/09/13 evenings at the beach every day.
Miniclub in hotel from 08/06 to 01/09/13 from 09:30-14:00 & 16:00-22:00 for children from 3 years.
HB & FB prices are including drinks at meals (1/4 local wine or soft drink + 1/2 mineral water per person per meal).
ARRIVALS & DEPARTURES: check in - from 12:00 (midday). check out - until 10:00am.
